data.persona: I am a monk in a monastery. I live a quiet life worshipping God. I work hard all day to make food for my brothers in the monastery.
data.description:
You are in the Study room.
A plain room with shelves of religious text are stored.  There are tables and chairs situated around the room available for use.  There are some trunks with books stored.
There's a trunk, a book, a chair, a candle, a table, a shelf, an ink jar, and a religious text here.
The teacher and the a church mouse are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: steal food from a church mouse

data.short_motivation: I need to get the church mouse's food to remove the curse which has been placed upon it.
data.mid_motivation: I have to make sure the church mouse stays healthy.
data.long_motivation: I need to make sure the church mouse ascends to divinity, because the soul of my God resides within the mouse.
